root.name: The Great Stroke-Off!
root.description: DescriptionClick and Point FTWThis game is made with the AGS engine and is an ATC (Adventure Team Challenge) Winner.Ned has taken on a summer job at his Uncle Ernie's "Stickz Ballz"amusement park. Ned's uncle recited half of a proverb to him and promised him a promotion if he can discover the remaining half. So Ned sets off completing different tasks around the amusement park while searching for the missing half of the proverb.On the way, Ned is confronted by opposing teams who are trying to win "The Great Stroke-Off Competition". Ned must choose which team to side with which in turns will determine how the game unfolds.
